* Make: Dell
* Brand: Inspiron
* Model: 2200
* Website: http://www.dell.com

=== Current Issues ===
Hibernate button does not function, worked under Dapper. Hibernating kills power managment functions. DesktopCD does not work on this machine.

=== Hardware details ===
The machine uses a Broadcom Wireless card. Intel 915GM Graphics.

==== Notes ====
1. Breezy: Used ndiswrapper to activate wireless in Breezy for testing purposes.
2. Dapper: Broadcom card needs further action by user to use for any encrypted protocol.
3. Feisty: Broadcom card needs further action - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=1071920&mode=linear|UbuntuforumsHOWTO]]</nowiki> works on this computer
4. Feisty: DesktopCD will not run on this computer. Startup progresses to the usplash screen, then screen blanks & dies. No VT available for command line access. No Xwindowing enabled. Same results in safe graphics mode.
5. After Hibernation, all power management functions have ceased.
